definition[0]: the act of putting something inside something else
definition[1]: something that is added to the middle of a document or piece of writing
definition[2]: when you add something new to a piece of writing, or the words that you add
example[0]: What effect will the insertion of this clause have?
example[1]: The group plans to put its views across through insertions in the daily press.
definition[4]: an occasion when an advertisement appears in a newspaper
example[2]: The Guitarist’s Readers’ Ads service averages over five hundred separate insertions per month.
